hero.title: Artisan Burgers
hero.subtitle: Forged with passion, served to perfection
hero.description: Premium ingredients, authentic recipes, and a unique industrial atmosphere. Welcome to the culinary experience that will transform the way you see burgers.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Flavors forged to perfection
menu.description: Each burger is a culinary work of art, prepared with selected ingredients and artisanal techniques.

classic.name: The Forged Classic
classic.description: 180g Angus beef, aged cheddar cheese, crispy lettuce, fresh tomato, and our special house sauce.

smoky.name: Industrial Smoked
smoky.description: 200g smoked rib meat, crispy bacon, smoked gouda cheese, caramelized onions, and artisanal BBQ sauce.

truffle.name: Black Truffle
truffle.description: 220g premium blend, sautéed mushrooms, brie cheese, fresh arugula, and black truffle mayonnaise.

inferno.name: Spicy Inferno
inferno.description: 180g Angus beef, jalapeños, ghost pepper, pepper jack cheese, and house sriracha sauce.

veggie.name: Urban Garden
veggie.description: Chickpea and beetroot burger, goat cheese, arugula, sun-dried tomatoes, and basil pesto.

bacon.name: Bacon Supreme
bacon.description: 200g Angus beef, triple layer bacon, cheddar cheese, fried egg, and honey mustard sauce.

cola.name: Artisan Cola
cola.description: Handcrafted cola served ice cold with ice and lime.

lemonade.name: Fresh Lemonade
lemonade.description: Homemade lemonade with fresh lemons, mint, and a touch of ginger.

craftBeerDrink.name: Craft Beer
craftBeerDrink.description: Rotating selection of local craft beers, ask your server for today's pick.

sparklingWater.name: Sparkling Water
sparklingWater.description: Premium sparkling mineral water, served with lemon.

fries.name: Crispy Fries
fries.description: Golden crispy fries seasoned with sea salt and aromatic herbs.

onionRings.name: Onion Rings
onionRings.description: Beer-battered onion rings fried until golden and crispy.

coleslaw.name: Coleslaw Salad
coleslaw.description: Shredded red cabbage and carrots with creamy homemade mayo dressing.

nachos.name: Supreme Nachos
nachos.description: Crispy nachos with melted cheese, guacamole, pico de gallo, and sour cream.

chocolateShake.name: Chocolate Shake
chocolateShake.description: Creamy Belgian chocolate shake with artisan ice cream and whipped cream.

strawberryShake.name: Strawberry Shake
strawberryShake.description: Refreshing fresh strawberry shake with vanilla ice cream.

vanillaShake.name: Vanilla Shake
vanillaShake.description: Classic Madagascar vanilla shake with premium ice cream.

oreoShake.name: Oreo Shake
oreoShake.description: Indulgent shake with crushed Oreo cookies and vanilla ice cream.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A passion forged in fire
about.description: We were born from the desire to create something different. We're not just another burger restaurant - we are artisans of flavor, forging each recipe with the same dedication a blacksmith gives to steel.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2019, Forge Burger was born in a converted old factory, maintaining the industrial essence that defines us. Every element of our space tells a story of transformation and dedication.

2019.title: The Beginning
2019.description: We opened our doors in a converted old factory in the heart of Porto. A dream come true.

2020.title: Resilience
2020.description: We adapted to challenges with home delivery and kept our community united.

2022.title: Expansion
2022.description: We renovated the space and tripled our capacity. New flavors, same passion.

2025.title: Recognition
2025.description: Awarded best artisan burger in Northern Portugal.

2026.title: The Future
2026.description: New projects on the way. The forge continues to burn stronger than ever.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To elevate the artisan burger to a form of culinary art, using local and sustainable ingredients, traditional techniques, and an atmosphere that transports our customers to a unique experience.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityDesc: Only the best ingredients, selected daily.
values.craftDesc: Each burger is handcrafted using traditional techniques.
values.sustainableDesc: Commitment to local suppliers and eco-responsible practices.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Unique experiences
events.description: Join us for themed nights, live music, and special events that turn a meal into a memorable experience.

liveMusic.name: Blues Night
liveMusic.description: Live blues music with the best local artists. Intimate atmosphere and special burgers.

burgerChallenge.name: Monster Challenge
burgerChallenge.description: Can you eat the 1kg burger in 30 minutes? The meal is on the house!

craftBeer.name: Craft Beer Pairing
craftBeer.description: Discover the best craft beer combinations with our premium burgers.

brunch.name: Sunday Brunch
brunch.description: Special brunch menu with breakfast burgers, eggs benedict, and mocktails.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our customers say
testimonials.description: Thousands of satisfied customers have passed through our doors. Discover what makes the Forge Burger experience so special.

review1.name: John Smith
review1.content: The best burger I've ever had in Portugal. The industrial atmosphere is fantastic and the meat melts in your mouth. I'll definitely be back!

review2.name: Maria Santos
review2.content: As a chef, I'm very demanding. Forge Burger exceeded all my expectations. Impeccable ingredient quality.

review3.name: Peter Costa
review3.content: I've been coming here every week for 2 years. The staff knows me by name and my favorite burger is always perfect.

review4.name: Anna Ferreira
review4.content: The Black Truffle is absolutely divine. The flavor combination is unique and the presentation is worthy of Michelin stars.
